full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN 'GRUB MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (CES DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RTZOD PA'I DUS KYI THA MA'I RANG CAG SEMS CAN RNAMS LA MI DANG MI MIN RNAMS KYI GNOD PA CHAR LTAR @004A *, ,'BABS PA'I DUS 'DI LA RANG GZHAN KUN LA PHAN PA DANG, KHYAD PAR RIGS DANG NUS PA'I SHIN TU MTHO ZHING PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DANG DAM TSIG GTZANG MA'I RNAMS KYI DGYOD YANGS PA THU SHE YE GUNG KHUN TI MING TUR GE CHE RIN CHEN RDO RJE DON DU, BTZUN GTZUGS DZNY'A MING CAN GYIS BRIS SO, ,BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN 'DOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
